review.title: Nice hotel close to the airport. Parking was easy.
review.reviewText:
Had a good 5D/4N stay in this hotel. Although the room given to us was fronting the highway and can hear the train passing through, the staff explained to us that it was part of the Expedia deal we got. No option of getting a free update which we expect some US hotels would give if the higher end rooms are not occupied. The breakfast set was okay, served hot each day, our children loved the waffles and we liked the bacon and eggs and potato Mexican style with salsa. 
Price is ok for an average 3-4star hotel. Will consider Marriott's hotels in the future.
review.positiveRemarks: Place beside the sea, enjoyed nice SanFo weather
review.locationRemarks: Can go morning jogs or walks beside the seaside, quick dip on the pool during summer days.

review.title: Wonderful
review.reviewText:
Wonderful location.  Front desk clerk was very friendly but lacked communication skills, (asked for a cab that could transport 5 people 3 separate times and she consistently said "yes, yes")...when the cab arrived, it could only hold 4 passengers!! Not only were we disgusted, the cab driver was very mad at US!  

The room was very spacious and clean.  The evening complimentary meal and drinks was a welcomed surprise.  Breakfast was delicious.  

I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone!
review.positiveRemarks: The complimentary meal and breakfast.  The building, room and grounds interior and exterior experience.
review.negativeRemarks: Only the front desk clerk's communications skills
review.locationRemarks: Many things to do inside and outside the hotel.

review.title: Nice
review.reviewText: Stayed here for prom, which was towards golden gate park, so location was a little bad because it is at least a twenty minute drive from many major attractions, but for how much I paid, awesome room, very comfortable. Loved the full kitchen :)

review.title: Great staff Ok rooms
review.reviewText: Front desk staff was great. From complimentary upgrades to recommending restaurants they excelled. Room was small but clean. Did not like the bathroom. The automatic exhaust fan was disrupting. .

managementResponses.response:
Dear Jaymee,

Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at the Residence Inn Oyster Point. We sincerely value your business and appreciate your feedback. I am grateful for your insights and I will be working with our Room Operations team to address the items mentioned in your comments about our staff and breakfast offerings. Feedback such as yours is integral as we work on improving our guest experience.

Sincerely,

review.reviewText: The room is great! But the Filipina receptionist is a little bit grumpy. Also they serve a gummy egg for breakfast
The front desk person whose name is Rose, she is so nice and helpful. We are very happy to stay at this hotel, and will recommend friend to stay here too.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Jake,

Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us. We appreciate your feedback and will be sharing this with our teams. If your travels bring your back to our area, we would love to serve you again.

Sincerely,

Shane
Assistant GM

review.title: Efficient hotel, great for a business person.
review.reviewText: Very clean hotel with a great staff. Free breakfast is OK, otherwise great value for the $$$.

Positives
Clean
Room are large
Good location near SF BAY TRAIL

Minus
Bathroom fan sound too high

review.title: Comfy Stay
review.reviewText: Clean, comfortable and relatively spacious room.  Satisfying breakfast.  Good value.

review.title: Hotel Review
review.reviewText: Overall, very satisfied with my stay. The staff are excellent in all regards.  The room was clean and in good repair. I found the location easy to get to and with an addition of a rental car to my travel package, within reasonable driving distance to the sights and activities on my holiday agenda.
review.negativeRemarks: King size beds would be much appreciated
review.locationRemarks: Close to airport and reasonable drive to other amenities.

review.title: Nice Hotel
review.reviewText: Good breakfast. Housekeeping excellent. Overall good experience
review.negativeRemarks: Carpet old. Elevators old and slow. Front desk friendly but not well informed.
review.locationRemarks: Location Ok, Things to do none.

review.title: Beautiful view across the Bay.
review.reviewText: Friendly helpful staff, convenient for the airport, drive to BART for access to city. Breakfast basic but okay.

review.title: Close to airport
review.reviewText: I was greeted professionally and felt well cared for. However, i did not like the room that we were assigned but accepted it because i was too tired to complain when we arrived so late at night. The room was fairly clean but i realized the next morning we were next to a train track that scared me first thing the following morning...i will recommend asking for a room on the opposite side facing the water!

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for your time writing this review regarding your stay with us.
I am sorry that you experienced the amount of noise that you indicated on your review.
We are pleased that you found the hotel clean and the staff friendly!

review.title: Must Love Planes, Trains and........
review.reviewText: The hotel is nice, comfortable & clean and the staff are friendly and helpful (though not completely informed of their own deal with Expedia). The only problem with this hotel is its proximity to the airport and Bart line. Although I was aware of this at the time of booking, I was a little surprised at the level of late night noise from the airport. Seemed like we were right at the end of the runway or maybe they change the flight path at night to avoid other more densely populated areas. I don't know, but it seemed that as soon as the Bart line (which literally runs alongside the hotel) ends its run for the day, the planes start theirs. They do have double paned windows but they don't seem to make much difference. However, being as I live along side the 405 fwy in Los Angeles, the noise was totally tolerable to me but it might not be for others
review.positiveRemarks: The hotel sits at the end of a small marina off the bay with a walkway along the waters edge. Lots of birds. Great place for a morning walk. Love that
review.negativeRemarks: Maybe invest in high end noise insulation for the walls(?).
review.locationRemarks: South SF so less populated. Hotel is located near several office complexes so it's crazy abandoned on the weekend. Not alot of food choices nearby :(

review.title: Clean/Quiet hotel close to the airport
review.reviewText: We only stayed one night before flying back home.  The hotel was quiet considering that it's close to the airport.  It's cleaned and comfortable.  Restaurants were only 5 minutes a way.  That was very convenient.  We would stay there again.
review.negativeRemarks: The breakfast area could use extra staff on the weekends.  It was very busy and so it got a little messy.  I like the eating area to be a bit cleaner.
review.locationRemarks: It's near by the airport so that wasn't much to do there except a few shops in the South San Francisco side.....5 minutes drive.

managementResponses.response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I amhappy to hear that the service was great and that you had a nice, quiet, calm room with a view of the Bay. Please come see us again soon.

review.title: Nice hotel, away from the city commotion
review.reviewText: Stayed here for two nights. Was better than I expected. I anticipated getting a room with a view to the lake but those were all booked. The girl at check in was very nice and put us in a room away from the train tracks to compensate and we got a partial lake view which was still very nice. It was quiet and calm away from the city noise but a close 7 min drive into downtown. The beds were not the softest but still we were able to get a goodnight sleep. We loved the continental breakfast, great variety of food and convenient. I would stay here again.

review.title: Nice hotel away from traffic
review.reviewText: Worked out great for us We didn't want to drive for two hours before the 49er game. Stayed the night and got to the game in ten minutes at candle stick park.

review.title: Nice and clean
review.reviewText: It was a nice place to could have been a little closer to down area .

review.title: Nice Hotel close to highway.
review.reviewText: Overall the hotel was very satisfactory. It was close to the airport (10 minutes away) and to At&t Park (20 minutes). It was a dog friendly hotel so we brought our mutt. It has a nice walking trail by the water.

review.title: Was not our first choice. But will be considered n
review.reviewText:
Breakfast can get busy. Food selection was great for us. Seating was limited. Ate in room.
We had to move our daughter out of SFSU. This is not the closest but it did not take long to take the streets.

review.title: Great hotel for a family
review.reviewText: Great hotel! Our family had a great time and hotel was a great place to stay so close to SF

review.title: pretty good for family
review.reviewText:
Pretty good for family

bizzare layout,sofebed was cheep and extremely uncomfortable. Good value for price given that this is South san fran. Morning breakfast was good. Fitness room was week. Staff helpful at times. For a Marriot, this particular hotel was on the week side, but would stay there again given the price of other hotels with children

review.title: Really enjoyed this Oyster Point hotel
review.reviewText: Every single member of the staff was professional and attentive. The hotel was extremely convenient and the free parking on-site was easy to find and accessible. The breakfast is served on the weekends until 10am and included hot food (ex: scrambled eggs, sausage, oatmeal, waffles, etc.) It looked like a great hotel for weekday travelers as well (with a nice dinner menu posted on the refrigerator) and the staff will assist with your grocery shopping. It was very clear that everything was thought through to ensure that guests would have a wonderful experience. We're definitely coming back.
review.positiveRemarks: GREAT staff, hot breakfast and free parking.
review.negativeRemarks: The bed could be more firm.
review.locationRemarks: Beautiful location away from the city.

review.title: Windy
review.reviewText: Not a great hotel...completely dissapointed. There was an ongoing drift inside my room even with the A/C off, very dusty.

review.title: Would deffinetly return
review.reviewText:
Nothing negative to say about our stay. The staff was helpful and cordial, the hotel was Marriott so we knew the room would be just fine.
Having breakfast and 3 nights of reception were a plus for getting the day started early.
Our room was extremely quiet.

review.title: Not for the business traveler
review.reviewText: I arrived at about 9:00pm and no food available - (no restaurant in the hotel) I picked this hotel because it was rated 5 starts by Exepdia user but...clearly for the family who wants to cook - not the business traveler. There wasn't even an ATM machine in the same building.

review.title: always reliable, always a great experience.
review.reviewText: as a family we always stay at the residence inn oyster point when in the sf area. the hotel always meets and exceeds expectations and only great things can be said about the staff and people in the hotel.

review.title: Awesome hotel!
review.reviewText: This hotel was awesome! We came from Ohio to San Francisco for our 25th wedding anniversary. We loved that they had a full breakfast every morning. The food was wonderful and it really helped us cut the cost of our trip. The area surrounding the hotel is gorgeous with a lake and a mountain to wake up to. The staff was courteous. The hotel room was quite comfortable. I liked that they had all the comforts of home...a microwave for leftovers and a fridge to store them in. We highly recommend this hotel and would absolutely stay there again. Oh--it is the only hotel I've ever been able to get some sleep in. The bed was just right.

review.title: Employees great
review.reviewText: The front desk was extremely helpful and friendly. We felt right at home.

review.title: Great location by the San Francisco bay
review.reviewText: Our stay at this hotel was great. The breakfast was excellent and it was in a great location by the San Francisco bay. A walking path ran by the hotel. Our room included a kitchen. We could have stayed there for several days and cook from the kitchen instead of going out. I think if we visit this area anytime in the near future, we will be staying at this hotel again.

review.title: Nice place reasonable price
review.reviewText: We enjoyed a great stay. Breakfast buffet was great and lots of choices for a buffet. Well located about 10 miles from Downtown and all attractions. You are very close to freeway and train tracks, train runs until about 10pm. Room was great and clean. Only issue we encountered was we made several requests for extra towels and pillows that we never received. Free parking a plus including the free shuttle to fishermans Wharf that runs on Fridays and Saturdays.

review.title: Good Hotel
review.reviewText: The hotel was v good. The service was much better than expected. Will definitely go to the same hotel again.

review.title: Would return again, again and probably again.
review.reviewText: The Residence Inn by Marriott San Francisco Airport was friendly and accommodating to our requests including extremely late check in, room change, housekeeping requests which included borrowing extra furniture, utensils, and kitchenware.

review.title: Vica, she was the BEST!!!!
review.reviewText: Vica, she was the BEST!!!!

review.title: Can't wait to go back!
review.reviewText: I loved my room. It was awesome. It was roomy and clean. The hotel provided a great breakfast buffet as well as light dinner meals every weekday night. There was plenty of parking. The pool and barbecue area added to the friendliness of the hotel. The free internet for my laptop was very fast. The staff was courteous, friendly and helpful.

review.title: WELL RECOMMENDED
review.reviewText: Staff wer very helpful. Room was meticulous. Hotel offered everything and more. Quiet location.

review.title: Nice Hotel
review.reviewText: All the good things you have grown accustomed to getting from Residence Inns. Staff is very friendly and the rooms were clean. The hotel is located right on the bay and there is access to a wonderful walking/bike path along the bay. Only caveat would be that the property is located right next to railroad tracks and it can get loud if your windows are not closed. I would certainly go back to this location.
